last_episode_to_air.name: How the West Was Fun
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Movers help a cowboy cross a canyon.

name: Imagination Movers
overview:
Imagination Movers is a Live-action Pre-school television series that premiered on September 6, 2008 on Disney Channel. The program was originally part of the Playhouse Disney daily block intended for preschoolers. On February 14, 2011, it was moved to the Disney Junior block, serving as Playhouse Disney's replacement.

The Imagination Movers TV series is based on the format and music of the New Orleans based music group Imagination Movers who both act and are co-executive-producers of the show.

On May 30, 2011, it was announced that the series will end after the remaining episodes of the third season have aired, though the band itself will continue and is open to doing other projects.

On November 28, 2011 the Movers ran an announcement on official Facebook page implying that they have been given the green light to air more new episodes of the show in 2012.

episodes.name: No Noise Is Good Noise
episodes.overview: The series begins with the Movers searching for the source of a loud noise that is interrupting one of their songs.

episodes.name: The Tooth Hurts
episodes.overview: Warehouse Mouse hides to avoid a visit to a veterinarian.

episodes.name: Bad Hair Day
episodes.overview: Scott has a bad hair day and won't let Nina take his picture until he gets his hair just right.

episodes.name: A Puppy Problem
episodes.overview: A puppy gets loose in the warehouse, and the guys try to find it.

episodes.name: Body Language
episodes.overview: The guys use pantomime to communicate with a foreign guest.

episodes.name: Super Goop
episodes.overview: Smitty and Rich get stuck together with a gooey substance used by Dave to repair broken items.

episodes.name: Heavy Reading
episodes.overview: The guys receive the world's largest phone book and must figure out a way to move it around.

episodes.name: It's A Breeze
episodes.overview: The guys search for the source of a strong wind that is blowing through the warehouse.

episodes.name: A Bee Story
episodes.overview: The guys try to catch Dave's Robo-Bee using their imaginations.

episodes.name: The Un-Party
episodes.overview: Nina and the guys plan a surprise birthday party for Knit Knots, but he doesn't like cake, decorations or games.

episodes.name: Too Cool
episodes.overview: The warehouse is very cold, what could be causing it and can the movers stop it?

episodes.name: Sneeze and Thank You
episodes.overview: Nina tries to determine what is causing Dave to sneeze so much.

episodes.name: Bucket of Trouble
episodes.overview: A commercial shoot is delayed when Rich gets his foot stuck in a bucket.

episodes.name: Finders Key-pers
episodes.overview: The guys help Knit Knots locate his missing keys.

episodes.name: Wayne Dance
episodes.overview: The movers use remote-control dancing shoes to help Nina's friend learn how to dance.

episodes.name: Hiccups
episodes.overview: Knit Knots is unable to finish a recording after he gets the hiccups.

episodes.name: All Broken Up
episodes.overview: The movers accidentally break Nina's clock and then try to fix it.

episodes.name: Knit Knots Gets Stuck
episodes.overview: Dave asks Knit Knots to try on his super bouncy suit.  Knit Knots gets a stuck zipper and it is a race against time to get hime free before his boring meeting.

episodes.name: Present Problem
episodes.overview: Nina has bought lots of presents, but they are all wrapped the same.  How will she figure out which present belongs to whom?

episodes.name: Who's Afraid of the Big, Bad Mouse?
March of the Movers
episodes.overview: The movers new customer is Maggie, she can't march and play her instrument at the same time.  Can the movers help?

episodes.name: Treasure of the Warehouse
episodes.overview: A famous fortune hunter arrives with a map indicating that there is buried treasure in the warehouse.

episodes.name: Mother's Day Gift
episodes.overview: Nina comes up with the perfect gift for her mother on mother's day - a song from the Movers.

episodes.name: Rockabye Rich
episodes.overview: Rich has trouble falling asleep.

episodes.name: Captain Terrific
episodes.overview: The second season begins with the guys helping Captain Terrific regain his ability to fly.

episodes.name: It's a Mystery
episodes.overview: Food goes missing from the warehouse and the guys attempt to solve the mystery.

episodes.name: Mousesitting
episodes.overview: The Movers help warehouse mouse babysit his nephew, Gouda

episodes.name: Slip Slidin' Away
episodes.overview: The guys attempt to navigate the newly waxed, very slippery, floors of the warehouse.

episodes.name: Second Chance Pants
episodes.overview: World famous cyclist Pants Armstrong crashes outside the warehouse.  Will the movers be able to help him cycle again?

episodes.name: A Monster Problem
episodes.overview: Eddie the monster is too scary, the movers help him become less scary.

episodes.name: A Fairy Tale Ending
episodes.overview: The Movers help Cinderella

episodes.name: Happy Ha Ha Holidays
episodes.overview: Santa has a problem he has lost his ho ho ho, can the Movers help?

episodes.name: Snow Day
episodes.overview: Nina needs to take photos in the snow, but becomes trapped in the warehouse.  Can the Imagination Movers escape?

episodes.name: Muffin Man
episodes.overview: Ben the baker makes the perfect muffins.  The problem is he can't remember all the ingredients.

episodes.name: Farmhouse Mouse
episodes.overview: Warehouse Mouse cousin farmhouse mouse comes to visit.  Even though they used to be best friends they can't agree on anything anymore, will the movers be able to help?

episodes.name: Tooth Fairy
episodes.overview: Gladys, the new tooth fairy keeps waking up children when she tries to replace teeth with money.

episodes.name: Ace Mulligan
episodes.overview: On March 13th, "Ace Mulligan" airs and guest stars the talented Travis Guba as customer and world famous golfer Ace Mulligan, a golfer who can't putt anymore because he has lost his lucky hat. The show features a fantastic new song called "Roll On Down" which hopefully will put you in a St. Patrick's Day mood.

episodes.name: Out of Tunes
episodes.overview: On March 26, "Out of Tunes" hits the airwaves and features Grammy award-winning Chris Thomas King as T-Bone Crosby, a musician having trouble writing new songs.

episodes.name: Power Play
episodes.overview: The guys attempt to save energy when the lights in the warehouse starts to flicker by using solar panels, a water wheel and a windmill.

episodes.name: Bye Bye Butterfly
episodes.overview: The movers and Warehouse Mouse help a scientist find a very rare butterfly that flew into the warehouse until they start having trouble catching it.

episodes.name: Birthday Ball
episodes.overview: The movers and Nina help a baseball player name Joey who faces a dilemma when an important playoff game falls on the same day as his son's birthday party.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: The Movers and Warehouse Mouse help Nina find a Hawaiian talent to perform at her Grandmother's birthday in Hawaii by doing anything that is popular in Hawaii.

episodes.name: Gimme Strength
episodes.overview: The movers help a circus strongman named Gunther the Great regain his strength through healthy eating, weight lifting and muscle-building exercises for a show in the circus.

episodes.name: Nina Gets the Giggles
episodes.overview: Nina can't stop her giggling while planning to play her harp right before a music recital, so the movers try to help her before her recital.

episodes.name: Seeing Stars
episodes.overview: The movers help famous a movie director named Stanley Spillburger find a leading man after his ends up with Chicken Pox for an upcoming film as the movers try to be the next leading man.

episodes.name: Mouse Day
episodes.overview: Warehouse Mouse is disappointed to learn that there isn't a holiday for mice, so the guys try to come up with the perfect holiday celebration for their friend.

episodes.name: Knight Time
episodes.overview: The movers and Nina help a timid, cowardly knight named Sir Fear-a-lot conquer his fear of the dark so he can rescue a princess.

episodes.name: The Tail of Captain Kiddo
episodes.overview: The guys help Captain Kiddo rediscover his pirate skills so he can set sail.

episodes.name: Goldilocks and the Four Movers
episodes.overview: The Movers must help Goldilocks fix her friendship with the three bears.  After they Brainstorm, Nina enters and suggests that Goldilocks and the Movers invite the bears to a picnic.

episodes.name: The Idea Café
episodes.overview: The Movers discover Bernie's Cafe has been packed into boxes because Bernie's retiring!  While reminiscing about the good food and times they had at Bernie's, the movers decide they need to find a way to replace all the things they love about the cafe.

episodes.name: Imagination Movers In Concert
episodes.overview: Rock out with the Imagination Movers!

episodes.name: Wishful Thinking
episodes.overview: A Genie named Al appears when Scott is cleaning an old brass oil lamp that he plans to give to Nina for her birthday.  The Genie tells Scott he has three wishes, but when Scott tries to make a wish, Al discovers his wish granting power is out of wack.

episodes.name: Slam Dunk Solution
episodes.overview: The Movers install a basketball hoop in the Idea Warehouse and all the Movers can't wait to play basketball, except for Smitty, who makes up an excuse that he can't play because he has to water his plants.

episodes.name: One Cool Mover
episodes.overview: A cool biker named Clutch rumbles into the Idea Cafe and the Movers have to help him get rid of the squeak in his motorcycle.

episodes.name: The Prince Frog
episodes.overview: The Movers must break the spell of an Evil Queen to turn a Prince named Jeremiah back into a frog.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: On Father's Day, the Mover's Dads come for a visit, but when they arrive at the Idea Warehouse, their Mover sons are gone.  The Dads must find Warehouse Mouse so they can read a note that the Movers left for them.

episodes.name: Castaways
episodes.overview: When the Movers go looking for Hawaiian flowers, shells and fresh fruit for Hawaiian Day, they get stuck on a deserted island.

episodes.name: Haunted Halloween
episodes.overview: When Warehouse Mouse is convinced he's seen a ghost, the Movers must prove to Warehouse Mouse and themselves that the Warehouse isn't haunted on Halloween.

episodes.name: A Little Elf Esteem
episodes.overview: The Movers need to help Carol, an Elf-in-Training, pass her test so she can get her Elf bells and deliver presents Christmas Eve with Santa.

episodes.name: Walkaway Walkie
episodes.overview: Dave loses his walkie talkie so he follows sound cues to locate it.

episodes.name: Award to the Wise
episodes.overview: Dave wins a science award for one of his inventions.

episodes.name: Nina's Day Off
episodes.overview: The Movers run the Idea Café so Nina can take a day off.

episodes.name: Say Cheese
episodes.overview: The Movers try to discover why a prized goat stopped giving milk that is needed by Nina to make her famous grilled cheese sandwiches.

episodes.name: Snorey Morrie
episodes.overview: Dave's uncle's snoring keeps the Movers from getting things done

episodes.name: Have You Ever Seen a Unicorn?
episodes.overview: The Movers need to help Princess Dalia catch a unicorn.

episodes.name: Scott and the Beanstalk
episodes.overview: The Movers need to find a way to rescue Scott's teddy bear from a Giant at the top of a beanstalk.

episodes.name: How the West Was Fun
episodes.overview: The Movers help a cowboy cross a canyon.

episodes.name: Uffle-Fluffs
episodes.overview: The Movers are overrun by fuzzy creatures.

episodes.name: Aloha Nina
episodes.overview: When the Movers are mistakenly led to believe that Nina is moving back to Hawaii, they quickly decide to throw her a party to show how much they care and try to convince her to stay.
